data.name: BIG Win!?
data.desc: Declare a Level between 1 and 12; each player tosses a coin, and if both are Heads, the Levels of all face-up monsters you currently control become the declared Level. If both are tails, you lose Life Points equal to the declared Level x 500.

data.name: Blue Duston
data.desc: Cannot be used as a Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Material for a Summon. While this card is face-up on the field, it cannot be Tributed. When this card on the field is destroyed: Banish 1 random card from its controller's hand, face-down, until the Standby Phase of the next turn. You can only control 1 face-up "Blue Duston".

data.name: Magicalized Duston Mop
data.desc: You can only control 1 "Magicalized Duston Mop". The equipped monster cannot be Tributed, or be used as a Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Material for a Summon. When this card you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect and sent to your Graveyard: You can add 1 "Duston" monster from your Deck to your hand.

data.name: Risebell the Star Psycher
data.desc: Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; increase its Level by 1.
